Cyber Security  Focused Company

About us

We are a young and experienced Cyber Security firm formed by a group of seasoned professionals. Our vision is to provide cutting-edge Cyber Security solutions and services to customers at an economical cost.

Read More

Advanced Cyber Security Solutions

SIEM Solutions

Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) is a type of software that gathers log data and real-time event data generated from systems throughout an organization’s technology infrastructure and turns it into actionable information.

Management System Implementation

Management system is defined as a framework of related elements within the organisation, implemented policies, specified objectives, and processes to achieve them.

Security Architecture

When developing enterprise cybersecurity architectures for an organization, the key is to remember it is like building a house. Houses are designed first before someone starts constructing them, where building architects defer on specifics to engineers and specialized resources.

Auditing

Our multidisciplinary and highly specialized skilled teams provide exceptional customer service, value and transparency through innovation to our global customers. We deliver high-quality consulting services, implementation services, reviews, assessments & audit services.

vCISO

A vCISO is a highly-trained cybersecurity expert contracted by an organization to handle its IT security and compliance programs. A vCISO brings years of cybersecurity experience gained from working with multiple organizations and across all areas of the economy.

Professional Cyber Security Solutions

Email Security

Web Security

Network Security

Remote Access Solution

End Point Security

Vulnerable Assessment and Penetration Testing

Application Security

Security Awareness Training

CUSTOMERS SERVED BY OUR TEAM
